page.title: 07The Farming Year.
page.content: This is an example of the local farming calendar: {January}Milking, calve cows and rear calves which is carried out throughout the year. Ploughing and manuring grounds. General maintainance. {February}Planting and fertilizing corn. {March}Planting of early potatoes. Fertilize grass. {April}Plant main crop potatoes. Inspect and spray corn for disease. Check fences on grazing fields. Plant peas and spray for weeds. {May}Plant turnips. Continue to spray when necessary. Move stock to summer grazing. {June}Make silage and hay. Inspect crops and spray potatoes against blight. { }
